pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: No hidden costs. No surprises.

faq.q1: Can I try Immivo for free?
faq.a1: Yes! You get a full trial week â€” completely free and without a credit card. During this time you have access to all basic features, including CRM, emails, calendar and properties. Jarvis (AI assistant) and the Image Studio have limited availability during the trial. After 7 days, your account is automatically paused â€” no charges unless you choose a plan.
faq.q2: What happens after the trial period?
faq.a2: After the free week, you can choose one of the three plans (Solo, Team or Enterprise). There's no automatic upgrade to a paid plan. If you don't choose a plan, your access is paused â€” but your data is kept for 30 days in case you decide later.
faq.a3: Yes, you can cancel anytime â€” no minimum term and no hidden costs. For monthly billing, cancellation takes effect at the end of the current month. For annual billing, at the end of the booked term. You keep full access to all features until then.
faq.q4: Is there a discount for annual payment?
faq.a4: Yes, with annual payment you save 10% compared to monthly billing. You can switch between monthly and annual billing at any time. The change takes effect at the next billing period.
faq.q5: What is a 'Seat' and how does it work?
faq.a5: A Seat is a user account for a member of your team. Solo includes 1 Seat (ideal for individual agents), Team includes 5 Seats (perfect for small to medium offices). Need more than 5 Seats? Then the Enterprise plan is right for you â€” contact us for a custom quote.
faq.a6: Payment processing is handled securely by Stripe, one of the world's leading payment providers. We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), SEPA direct debit and invoicing. All payment data is encrypted and processed directly by Stripe â€” we never have access to your card details.
faq.a7: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. When upgrading, the new price is prorated. When downgrading, the change takes effect at the next billing period.
faq.a8: No. There are no setup fees, no onboarding costs and no hidden charges. You only pay the monthly or annual price of your chosen plan.
faq.a9: Yes, fully. We host all data on AWS EU (Frankfurt). All data is encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS/HTTPS). Each customer has their own isolated data space (multi-tenancy). There is no third-party tracking.
faq.q10: What's included in the free version?
faq.a10: In the free trial, you have access to all basic features: CRM, lead management, properties, email integration and calendar. Jarvis AI assistant and the AI Image Studio have limited availability. Portal push (publishing to real estate portals) is not available in the free version.

pricing.stillQuestions: Still have questions? We're happy to help.

about.title: We make agents <bold>unstoppable.</bold>
about.subtitle: Immivo is the first fully AI-powered operating system for the real estate industry. Two founders, one mission: free agents from paperwork.
about.storyP1: Early 2026. Vienna. Two founders sit in a coffee house discussing a problem that affects the entire real estate industry: agents spend 80% of their time on emails, paperwork and organization â€” instead of doing what they're passionate about.
about.storyP2: The idea was simple: What if an AI assistant could handle all daily operations? Not another CRM. Not another tool. A complete operating system that thinks ahead.
about.storyP3: From this idea, Immivo was born â€” and from the assistant came Jarvis.
about.innovationDesc: AI isn't just a feature â€” it's the foundation of our platform.
about.simplicityDesc: Complex technology that feels simple to use.
about.trustDesc: GDPR-compliant. AWS EU. Your data belongs to you.
about.customerSuccessDesc: We only win when our customers win.
about.ctaSubtitle: Discover how Immivo transforms your daily operations â€” in a free demo or try it yourself.

privacy.confirmDeleteWarning: This action is irreversible. The following data will be deleted:
